attributes.action: Build M.P's a block of apartments to live in.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose that a block of apartments are built for M.P's to live in, as close to westminster as is practicable.
this would replace the need for a second home allowance.
They can be built to high standards.
Each out of London constituancy has an apartment which is the residence of the elected M'P.
The apartments belong to the tax payer and maintenance will be paid by the state thus negating the majority of expenses currently being claimed.
Furnishings can be of a high standard.
Also security must be exceptional and will be easier to provide at an econmical cost.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
